titleStmt.title: An exposition of the seven epistles to the seven churches together with a brief discourse of idolatry, with application to the Church of Rome / by Henry More ...
titleStmt.author: More, Henry, 1614-1687.

notesStmt.note: Each part has special t.p.: the first with title, "A propheticall exposition of the seven epistles," and the second, "An antidote against idolatry."
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
